version_description:
- bugs fixes
- added the blueprint "Watch tower"
- added support for English

Write your wishes on johhhny-dev@mail.ru

- added the blueprint "Roadsign Gloves"
Write your wishes on johhhny-dev@mail.ru

- adjustment of resources for raid
- added blueprint "SAM Ammo"

The long-awaited update!
- full update of data on the raid and blueprints
- slightly changed the design
- now all information is downloaded via the Internet, so there must be a connection. We did this in order to make updates to the database faster (rather than wait a year :D)
- now works from iOS 11

Thank you for your patience!

- solved the problem with the black screen on iOS 12
- fixed errors in localization
- fixed some bugs and increased productivity

-increased performance
-fixed an error where items from the database didn't load

Write your wishes by e-mail johhhny-dev@mail.ru

- added the small furnace and the Small Oil Refinery. Now you can use them effectively.
- a pleasant addition for those one who supported the application and disabled ads. Added "Basket" for the raid. If you have a list of what you want to destroy and a huge selection of weapons, then put it all in the basket and find out the total cost of gunpowder and other things. The button “add to basket” is located above the picture of each weapon.

Mistakes, inaccuracies and your wishes, send to johhhny-dev@mail.ru
